00054 void bmo_mesh_to_bmesh_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00055 {
00056     Object *ob = BMO_slot_ptr_get(op, "object");
00057     Mesh *me = BMO_slot_ptr_get(op, "mesh");
00058     int set_key = BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "set_shapekey");
00059 
00060     BM_mesh_bm_from_me(bm, me, set_key, ob->shapenr);
00061 
00062     if (me->key && ob->shapenr > me->key->totkey) {
00063         ob->shapenr = me->key->totkey - 1;
00064     }
00065 }
00066 
00067 void bmo_object_load_bmesh_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00068 {
00069     Object *ob = BMO_slot_ptr_get(op, "object");
00070     /* Scene *scene = BMO_slot_ptr_get(op, "scene"); */
00071     Mesh *me = ob->data;
00072 
00073     BMO_op_callf(bm, "bmesh_to_mesh mesh=%p object=%p notessellation=%b", me, ob, TRUE);
00074 }
00075 
00076 void bmo_bmesh_to_mesh_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00077 {
00078     Mesh *me = BMO_slot_ptr_get(op, "mesh");
00079     /* Object *ob = BMO_slot_ptr_get(op, "object"); */
00080     int dotess = !BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "notessellation");
00081 
00082     BM_mesh_bm_to_me(bm, me, dotess);
00083 }
